pic1_alt: An example Leaflet map using non-geographic Star Trek map tiles. Alien territories are marked, with the 'Breen Confederacy' prominent at the top-left. A zoom card shows Hoshi Sato from Enterprise, with information about Earth.
pic2_alt: The rtrek package hex logo. The background is the Federation logo from Star Trek, with an almost white 'R' layered on top of that, and then 'trek' in light blue layered on top of the R.
